markdownRemark.excerpt: Was this "œleisurely, Latinate sort of reading and study" viewed with more respect by scholars than quick reference books? If so, did this have to do with new…
markdownRemark.html: Was this "œleisurely, Latinate sort of reading and study" viewed with more respect by scholars than quick reference books? If so, did this have to do with new conceptions about time, or has the value of lengthy study been around since antiquity?
